subject: Request for Order Information via Email
description_text:
Hello,
I would like to request that all information regarding my order be sent to
me via email, including the order details and tracking updates.
My order number is *#JRWKKU6NK*, and my phone number is *+82 010-3740-8057*.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi 임동권,    Please provide your order date, time, and name, and I will help you locate the order number.

Ok.

I will send you a screenshot of the order screen.

Thank you.



2025년 12월 8일 (월) 오후 7:44, service@simsonn.com

Order date and time : 2025.12.07 pm 02:40

Name: Dongkwon Lim


2025년 12월 8일 (월) 오후 7:47, 임동권 <limdongkwon@gmail.com>님이 작성:

> Ok.
>
> I will send you a screenshot of the order screen.
>
> Thank you.
>
>
>
> 2025년 12월 8일 (월) 오후 7:44, service@simsonn.com
Hi 임동권,  Sorry, could you please give me the amount? Thank you.

The payment amount is 159,000 KRW, and it is also indicated in the
attachment I previously sent.

Thank you.

2025년 12월 8일 (월) 오후 9:05, service@simsonn.com
Hi 임동권,  Noted. The new 2-in-1 shifter is expected to be developed and ready for shipment by December 15th.
